title: 2025 SAG Awards Winners List (Updating Live)
description: "Wicked" and "Shogun" led the film and TV nominations respectively, with five nods apiece.
author: Christian Blauvelt
excerpt: The 2025 SAG Awards Winners List: Updating live throughout the night February 23. 'Wicked' topped the film nominations, and 'Shogun' TV.
text: It’s always fitting that the Screen Actors Guild Awards take place at Los Angeles’s Shrine Auditorium, because this awards show is a kind of shrine itself: An occasion for Hollywood’s best and brightest to come and pay tribute, with devotional flourishes, to the art of acting. By the time the 2025 SAG Awards winners list is fully unveiled you will have heard the word “craft” quite a few times: Actors love to pepper that word into their acceptance speeches as if they’re back at the Actors Studio. We’ll also get a more complete sense of where the Oscar race stands a week out from the Academy Awards. “Wicked” received the most SAG nominations of any film, with five, including a surprise nod for Jonathan Bailey, as well as Best Ensemble. It’s possible that it’s more poised for below-the-line wins at the Oscars than for its performers, however. “A Complete Unknown” and “Emilia Pérez” followed with four SAG nods. While “Shogun” topped the TV nominees with five, and kicked off the 2025 SAG Awards by winning the award for Best TV Stunt Ensemble. (“The Fall Guy” won Best Film Stunt Ensemble.) Kristen Bell will serve as host for the 2025 SAG Awards, which will stream on Netflix starting at 8:00pm ET/5:00pm PT. Keep checking back throughout the night as the SAG winners list below is updated. Winners will be indicated in bold. html:
It’s always fitting that the Screen Actors Guild Awards take place at Los Angeles’s Shrine Auditorium, because this awards show is a kind of shrine itself: An occasion for Hollywood’s best and brightest to come and pay tribute, with devotional flourishes, to the art of acting. By the time the 2025 SAG Awards winners list is fully unveiled you will have heard the word “craft” quite a few times: Actors love to pepper that word into their acceptance speeches as if they’re back at the Actors Studio.

We’ll also get a more complete sense of where the Oscar race stands a week out from the Academy Awards. “Wicked” received the most SAG nominations of any film, with five, including a surprise nod for Jonathan Bailey, as well as Best Ensemble. It’s possible that it’s more poised for below-the-line wins at the Oscars than for its performers, however.

“A Complete Unknown” and “Emilia Pérez” followed with four SAG nods. While “Shogun” topped the TV nominees with five, and kicked off the 2025 SAG Awards by winning the award for Best TV Stunt Ensemble. (“The Fall Guy” won Best Film Stunt Ensemble.)

Kristen Bell will serve as host for the 2025 SAG Awards, which will stream on Netflix starting at 8:00pm ET/5:00pm PT.

Keep checking back throughout the night as the SAG winners list below is updated. Winners will be indicated in bold.
